member.name: ITfCreatePropertyStore.CreatePropertyStore
member.summary: Creates a property store object from serialized property store data.
member.param: Contains the type identifier of the property. For more information, see .
Pointer to an object that contains the text to be covered by the property store.
Contains the size, in bytes, of the property store data contained in pStream.
Pointer to an IStream object that contains the property store data.
Pointer to an interface pointer that receives the property store object created by this method.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfCreatePropertyStore.IsStoreSerializable
member.summary: Determines if a property store can be stored as persistent data.
member.param: Contains the type identifier of the property. For more information, see .
Pointer to an object that contains the text covered by the property store.
Pointer to a BOOL that receives a flag that indicates if the property store can be serialized. Receives nonzero if the property store can be serialized or zero otherwise.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfCreatePropertyStore
member.summary: The ITfCreatePropertyStore interface is implemented by a text service to support persistence of property store data. The TSF manager uses this interface to determine if a property store can be serialized and to create a property store object for a serialized property.
